meanings.definition: The act or power of exerting influence in opposition to another influence.
meanings.sent1: Her counterinfluence helped balance out the negative impact of his strong opinions.
meanings.sent2: The counterinfluence of the new team member brought fresh ideas to the project.
meanings.sent3: The counterinfluence of the mischievous squirrel made the serious meeting more lighthearted.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, the counterinfluence of different parties can create a delicate balance.
meanings.sent5: The counterinfluence of the calming music transformed the tense atmosphere into one of relaxation.

meanings.definition: A force or factor that works in opposition to an influence.
meanings.sent1: The counterinfluence of peer pressure can sometimes lead to different choices.
meanings.sent2: The counterinfluence of the cold weather made the warm soup even more comforting.
meanings.sent3: The counterinfluence of the playful puppy made the grumpy cat more tolerant.
meanings.sent4: In nature, the counterinfluence of predators keeps the ecosystem in balance.
meanings.sent5: The counterinfluence of the supportive crowd boosted her confidence on stage.
